member.name: T:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Notifications.KryptonToastNotificationPopup
member.summary: Non-visual component to show a notification window in the right lower corner of the screen. Adapted from: https://github.com/Tulpep/Notification-Popup-Window/blob/master/Tulpep.NotificationWindow/PopupNotifier.cs
